com.fasterxml.clustermate.service

Class ServiceRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fasterxml.clustermate.service.ServiceRequest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DecodableRequestPath
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    JaxrsHttpRequest, ServletServiceRequest

    public abstract class ServiceRequest
extends Object
implements DecodableRequestPath
    Interface class that defines abstraction implemented by classes that enclose details of a (HTTP) request that server receives.

    Separated out to allow handlers to operate independent of the container like Servlet or JAX-RS container.

      • getPath

        public String getPath()
        Description copied from interface: DecodableRequestPath
        Method for returning current remaning path (not including parts that have been removed with DecodableRequestPath.nextPathSegment()); and without additional URL decoding (but may have been decoded, as per DecodableRequestPath.getDecodedPath()). Usually used to be able to later on reset path with setPath().
        Specified by:
        getPath in interface DecodableRequestPath

      • getDecodedPath

        public String getDecodedPath()
        Description copied from interface: DecodableRequestPath
        Method for returning current remaining path, but first URL decoding it if necessary (if DecodableRequestPath.isPathDecoded() returns false).
        Specified by:
        getDecodedPath in interface DecodableRequestPath

      • isPathDecoded

        public boolean isPathDecoded()
        Description copied from interface: DecodableRequestPath
        Whether path as returned by DecodableRequestPath.getPath() has already been URL decoded or not.
        Specified by:
        isPathDecoded in interface DecodableRequestPath

      • setPath

        public void setPath(String path)
        Description copied from interface: DecodableRequestPath
        Method for resetting currently active path. Note that the value must obey same "has been URL decoded" value as what DecodableRequestPath.isPathDecoded() returns; not encoding or decoding is done by this method.
        Specified by:
        setPath in interface DecodableRequestPath

      • nextPathSegment

        public String nextPathSegment()
        Description copied from interface: DecodableRequestPath
        Method for checking the next available path segment, if any are left, removing ("consume") it, and returning to caller.
        Specified by:
        nextPathSegment in interface DecodableRequestPath

      • matchPathSegment

        public boolean matchPathSegment(String segment)
        Description copied from interface: DecodableRequestPath
        Method for checking that the next path segment (as returned by DecodableRequestPath.nextPathSegment()) would match given segment; and if so, remove the segment and return true. Otherwise returns null and leaves path unchanged.
        Specified by:
        matchPathSegment in interface DecodableRequestPath
